articles.description: Hillbilly Elegy's Ron Howard, Amy Adams, and Glenn Close defend the film against its many negative reviews, promising that the story has nothing to do with politics and is meant to humanize the family at its center.

articles.title: Pat Patterson, the first openly gay pro wrestling star, has died at 79 - NBC News
articles.description: Pro wrestling icon Pat Patterson, the industry's first openly gay star and a lieutenant of promoter Vince McMahon, has died. The WWE Hall of Fame member was 79.
articles.content:
